name: RecommendationsRelatedToMedicationRegimenChangeMedicationDosingInterval
title: Recommendations Related to Medication Regimen, Change Medication Dosing Interval
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes that represent an instance where a provider recommends to a prescriber or "provider in charge" to modify a medication dosing interval, or frequency a dose is given, within a prescribed regimen.),(Data Element Scope: Datatype: Intervention

The intent of this data element is to document a drug therapy recommendation to modify a medication dosing interval within a prescribed treatment regimen.),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes that represent a recommendation to modify the dosing interval of a medication or therapy.),(Exclusion Criteria: Any codes that represent an explicit action has taken place or other codes for recommendations that are not specifically for changing a medication dosing interval.)

concept.display: Recommendation to change medication dosing interval (procedure)
Recommendation to increase medication dosing interval (procedure)
Recommendation to decrease medication dosing interval (procedure)
